q1.question: Which model should I choose?
q1.answer: Choose Buy & Own if you prefer one-time payments and full code ownership. Choose Subscribe & Relax if you want a low barrier to entry (minimal setup fee) and ongoing support included.

q2.question: What's included in the management plans?
q2.answer: Management plans include hosting & domain management, security updates, minor content changes (hours vary by tier), performance monitoring, and email support. They're optional for Buy & Own but highly recommended for peace of mind.

q3.question: Can I switch models later?
q3.answer: Yes! Subscribe & Relax clients can buy the code after 2 years for ‚Ç¨500. Buy & Own clients can add management plans anytime. We're flexible ‚Äî your business evolves, your website should too.

q4.question: What happens after the 2-year subscription commitment?
q4.answer: After 2 years, you can: (1) Continue month-to-month with 30 days notice, (2) Buy the code for ‚Ç¨500 and own it forever, or (3) Cancel anytime with no penalty.

q5.question: Do I need to understand hosting, DNS, SEO, or technical stuff?
q5.answer: Nope. With Subscribe & Relax or management plans, I handle everything. Without management, I can still help set things up and guide you ‚Äî you just manage renewals and updates yourself.

q6.question: What counts as 'content changes' in management plans?
q6.answer: Text updates, image swaps, color tweaks, minor layout adjustments. Complex changes like adding new pages, custom forms, or features are quoted separately at a standard hourly rate.
